comment.body: Go to bowling in UnterfÃ¶hring and afterwards upstairs to the restaurant
Le hygge Is great!! Much more affordable than other bars and so cozy
The Holzkranich Bar has a room in the basement that you can rent. Otherwise, there are also cultural centers that rent out rooms cheaply.
I just checked and it looks perfect! When you say renting it means there is something to pay unlike a normal reservation right?
You can do both: make a reservation as well as rent the cellar room :) The best thing to do is just give them a call or send them an e-mail. Ja
